items.name: Torch
items.description: A wooden stick with one end wrapped in cloth soaked in flammable oil. When lit, it provides light in a limited area.

items.name: Traveler's Rations
items.description: A package of dried food, suitable for sustenance during a journey. Contains hardtack, jerky, and dried fruits.

items.name: Rope (50 feet)
items.description: A coil of sturdy hemp rope, 50 feet in length. Useful for climbing, tying knots, or securing objects.

items.name: Traveler's Clothes
items.description: A set of simple, durable clothing suitable for long journeys. Includes a shirt, pants, boots, and a cloak.

items.name: Backpack
items.description: A sturdy canvas backpack with multiple compartments and straps for carrying equipment and supplies.
